title: Will Matisse Thybulle play tonight vs. the Nuggets?
text:
Matisse Thybulle Injury Status & News: Trail Blazers vs. Nuggets | December 19
Due to an injured ankle, Matisse Thybulle won't suit up for the upcoming matchup against the Nuggets on Thursday, December 19 at Moda Center.
